main event: A gas bluish white ball with a tail was observed flying straight for 4 to 5 seconds before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting duration was only 4 to 5 seconds., The object was described as having a bluish white color with a tail., The sighting occurred at Oxnard AFB in California in 1956., The report indicated that the sighting was possibly caused by a meteor., Various conclusions were considered, including it being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
sighted object: gas bluish white ball with tail
